title: Environment 1990
creator_credit: Hugh Macdonald, David H. Fowler and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Depicts the effects of man upon his environment through mainly visual images. Emphasises the individual’s responsibility in protecting the environment for future generations Credits include: photography by Sam Grau; music by Tony Baker and sound by Kit Rollings
creator_credit_for_label: Hugh Macdonald, David H. Fowler and New Zealand National Film Unit
